General.Description: Vechain is a blockchain platform designed for products and information. This means that Vechain helps to monitor and track liquor, luxury, automobiles, retail, agriculture, and more with their blockchain.
General.Features: Vechain offers a blockchain helping track this information and products to ensure their authenticity and quality.
General.Technology: VeChain is a blockchain that is decentralized for products and information, building a trust-based and distributed business ecosystem based on blockchain technology.
